nodes.text: A skirmish occurred on Felucia when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, and Skywalker's Padawan Ahsoka Tano allied themselves with a band of bounty hunters to defend a farming settlement from pirates led by Weequay pirate Hondo Ohnaka. The Jedi and bounty hunters' efforts prevailed over the pirate band's, though with some loss of life. Embo broke a pirate's neck
